item.title: Alice Rohrwacher’s ‘LA CHIMERA’ starring Josh O’Connor received a 9-minute standing ovation at the 76th Cannes Film Festival.

item.title: Jonah Hauer-King photographed by Jack Alexander for Euphoria Magazine

item.title:
“I haven’t ever talked to Ryan Reynolds’ agent, but his agent is like, ‘Well, it cost $50 million.’ Well, good for him that he’s making so much money. But those movies don’t exist in the zeitgeist. It’s almost like they don’t even exist.”
(https://deadline.com/2023/05/quentin-tarantino-retirement-james-bond-tv-cannes-1235379761/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Quentin Tarantino questions “what even is a motion picture anymore?”
“Not picking on anybody but apparently for Netflix, Ryan Reynolds has made $50M on this movie, $50M on that movie, $50M on the next movie. I don't know what any of those movies are. Never seen them. Have you?"
item.author: FilmUpdates
